job_title: Life Enrichment Associate in Norridge, IL
pros: Nice residents. Extremely rewarding to engage them and add joy to their lives. Some very nice co-workers & peaceful facility.
cons: Total lack of professionalism and zero management skills from the Life Enrichment Director.

job_title: Assistant Director of Nursing in Norridge, IL
pros:
I have worked at MANY nursing facilities during my time in nursing, however, CBV is by far the most caring, well grounded, respectful place that I have ever worked for. The value people as individuals and respect their life and need for work balance. 
 I have found that they are genuinely compassionate not just toward care of resident but of the staff as well. During times of COVID, they were concerned about the staff and did all they could do to make sure they were taken care of. The little things mean a lot. Constant thank you and recognition, whether it be verbal, emotional or with a meal. I have found that they really do care and try their best to make the work environment one of team work, happiness, gratitude and understanding. I am grateful to be here.
cons: No place is perfect, the facilities deals with all the cons any other facility deals with; these issues are usually related to individual staff members that do no comply with protocol and procedures; staff members that believe they deserve more for doing the bare minimum or staff members that are just extra. They weed themselves out eventually.

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Norridge, IL
cons: VERY unprofessional. I begged for a recommendation letter serval times never got one. I was put not the schedule numerous times when I wasn't even scheduled nor was it my normal hours. They would manipulate you into thinking your hours were too little by explaining how many hours you need in position in a pay period. Funny thing is they would say the pay period was 4 days to get you to work!
Management has favorites and micromanaged a lot.

pros: Trained in skills transferable to other facilities.
cons: Lots of turnover, unrealistic expectations, very low pay, not all instructions given to all employees,  Used as temps and transferred.

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Norridge, IL
pros: Great community, everyone is super friendly and get along well
cons: Often short staffed, but management really tries to keep that to a minimum.
